input.devices

Class MouseKeyBoardHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • input.devices.MouseKeyBoardHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MouseKeyBoardHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Input, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    Class that implements a mouse and keyboard input handler.

      • isDetecting

        public boolean isDetecting(java.lang.String inputEvent)
        Description copied from interface: Input
        Test if for a generic input device and specific provided event is occurring, e.g., mouse button or keyboard key is pressed.
        Specified by:
        isDetecting in interface Input
        Parameters:
        inputEvent - specific provided generic input event, e.g., mouse button pressed, keyboard key press, 3D camera detected movement, etc.
        Returns:
        TRUE if provided input event is occurring, otherwise returns FALSE.

      • getPosition

        public javax.vecmath.Point3f getPosition()
        Description copied from interface: Input
        Get the position in 3D Cartesian space of a generic device cursor, e.g., for a Wiimote its a X, Y, Z coordinate, for a mouse its the mouse cursor X and Y values, etc.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        X, Y, and Z coordinates of generic cursor.
